snippet: John Martello ran the club on Gramercy Park for nearly 20 years, during which it endured steady six-figure deficits, seven-figure debts, costly labor disputes and unrest from members.
abstract: Players Club, 124-year-old private theater arts organization on Gramercy Park in Manhattan, removes its long-serving executive director John Martello amid charges of financial mismanagement.
lead_paragraph: John Martello ran the club on Gramercy Park for nearly 20 years, during which it endured steady six-figure deficits, seven-figure debts, costly labor disputes and unrest from members.

headline.main: Players Club Removes Director Amid Turmoil
headline.print_headline: Director of the Players Club Is Removed Amid Turmoil
